song_lyrics: Ho vikase vārij sam ati chhabi en,
Bhrūkuṭi bhramar zūke mānu ras lain... Rasiyo° 1
Kuṭil kaṭākṣha umen suchavat sain... Rasiyo° 2
Ho Jamunā pulinpar chārat hai dhen,
Ho māī Brajnārī sang khelo din rain,
Premānand chhabi par vāri koṭi main... Rasiyo° 4
title: Rājīvnain Rasiyo Rājīvnain

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-377: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Murtina Pad
